name: Space Station Disaster
story: You are the chief engineer aboard a failing space station. Critical systems are malfunctioning and you must work quickly to save the crew.

engineering_bay.name: Engineering Bay
engineering_bay.description: The main engineering control center. Warning lights flash across multiple consoles.

scene_counter.story: The space station has suffered a catastrophic failure. You need to assess the damage and prioritize repairs.

turn_counter.story: Life support systems are failing. Oxygen levels are dropping. You must work quickly.

min_scene_turns.story: You've stabilized the immediate crisis. Now you need to repair the backup systems before the primary systems fail completely.

min_turns.story: You're in the final phase of repairs. The station's orbit is decaying. Can you restore power in time?

opening_prompt: Red alert klaxons blare throughout the station. You're the chief engineer, and multiple critical systems have just failed. The crew is depending on you.
game_end_prompt: Mission outcome determined based on your engineering decisions and speed of response.
